author: D. Chronic
comment: I think everyone should have this face! Very easy to use and clear and easy to read!
title: Awesome face

author: Shaun Mulrainey
comment: Brilliant

author: Jason Stamp
comment: The design is wonderful, but on my zenwatch 2 something is off with the main time display; it appears that the date is on top of the time instead of side by side with it. If fixed it would definitely be a 5 star. UPDATE: The issue seems to have solved itself,  or was fixed in an update. 5 stars!
title: Great face, but currently unusable on my zenwatch 2

author: Omar Lugo
comment: Great development, originality
title: Like it

author: Russian Bot
comment: I'm with Andrei: I'd love to see a black/white pattern in standby. This face is utterly cool in active mode, but turns pretty plain in standby. Interactive button is genius.
title: Almost perfect!

author: Kevin Veroneau
comment: My only complaint is that you cannot set it to display the weather in Celsius with the new interactive mode.  Seems to be accurate for my location if I do a Fahrenheit to Celsius conversion.  Otherwise this is a five star watch face for sure.
title: Great watch face

author: Austin Stoffel
comment: Cool looking and functional watch face. The third interactive screen is not working for me. Do I have to configure the weather settings somewhere? I just get dashes.

reply.author: Stoneface
reply.content: Do you have the internet connection?

author: Paulo Varella
comment: How do I change the temperature unit to Celsius? It will be 4 stars after that
title: Good, just a remark

author: Mike Hickman
comment: Unusable on moto 360 gen 2..scrambled lettering...

reply.author: Stoneface
reply.content: I have fixed it. Please download the update in Google Play

title: Lettering scrambled..

author: Web Warrior
comment: Love the design and works pretty well. Just have to make sure I have WiFi to get the weather
title: Great face

author: Andrei Gherzan
comment: Very nice idea. Might me worth it to implement some electronics elements in the "standby" mode.

author: joey bond
comment: Would be 5 star if it had 12h time but still an awesome face great job

reply.author: Stoneface
reply.content: There is the automatic 12h time format. What country are you from?

title: Needs 12h time.

author: Dean Wallace
comment: Like it.  Bit more functionality might be nice, but I'm into minimalism these days.

author: Jeremy Tysiachney
comment: Great new features.

author: Paul Egan
comment: New feature step in terms right direction

author: Terry M
comment: Numbers overlap other numbers. On the time/date and battery screens on SW3 making watchface unusable   Refunded. Please fix and I'll consider repurchase.
title: Had this face for 2 minutes

author: Diamond Productions
comment: My phone or watch would not let me fined or even set this watch face looks good but next time I will never judge it by its cover not good at all fix please and may get it back ☺
title: Not good

author: stephen hastewell
comment: Shows the time as 00:13am when it's 12:13pm! All other watch faces I own show correct pm time!
title: Looks nice but didn't know what time of day it is!

author: Demir Bracic
comment: If you give the option to do 12 hour vs 24 hour and gave me the option to use Fahrenheit vs Celsius I would have no problem giving this 5 stars.
title: Great concept.... not ready

author: Team USA
comment: Refunded . they did not show like the picture does.

reply.author: Stoneface
reply.content: I have fixed it. Please download the update in Google Play

title: The digits were all weird looking

author: Gary Dunagan
comment: Crappy.

reply.author: Stoneface
reply.content: You have to wait a minute after the installation. Then you can find the watch face on Android Wear app or on your wear

title: Wouldn't install
